name: Celebrity
description: You are what wrestling means to the wider world. Celebrity wrestlers bring the fame of their non-wrestling careers back to the promotion, giving them pull with management to shape their own storylines.

name: Icon
description: You're the personification of what wrestlers want to be. Iconic wrestlers make even the most difficult maneuvers look easy and can work with anyone to make the fans go wild.

name: Legend
description: You're legendary, an inspiration to the fans. Legendary wrestlers are always popular and reflect that glory onto anyone they work with.

name: Lucha Libre
description: If you are playing a wrestler who's been studying Lucha Libre, you now can use Tecnico and Rudo in the same way as the Luchador.
